contact_overline: Join the Computer Engineering Scientific Association at Quchan University of Technology
prefer_email_detail: Have questions about our activities or research? We'd love to hear from you.
contact_intro: Interested in joining the IEEE Computer Engineering Student Branch at Quchan University of Technology? Have questions about our activities, research, or events? We'd love to connect with you.
cookie_consent_subtitle: We use cookies to enhance your experience
cookie_consent_description: We use cookies to provide you with the best possible experience on our website. Some cookies are essential for the site to function, while others help us understand how you use our site so we can improve it.
cookie_privacy_notice: By continuing to use our site, you agree to our
cookie_essential_desc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services.
cookie_functional_desc: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.
cookie_analytics_desc: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular.
cookie_marketing_desc: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.
cookie_preferences_desc: These cookies enable the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personal features such as language preferences and region selection.
cookie_management_description: Manage your cookie preferences and learn more about how we use cookies on our website.
save_changes_to_apply: Save your changes to apply the new cookie settings
cookie_info_description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our site.
cookie_contact_info: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us.
cookie_settings_saved: Your cookie preferences have been saved successfully!
email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
